items.sentence: I\'m afraid I don\'t understand what you\'re saying.
At that time, Tom was sitting between Mary and John.
Did Tom tell Mary where she was supposed to meet us?
Do you really think Tom will come back to Australia?
Can you briefly sum up what was said at the meeting?
I\'m not interested in hearing any of your theories.
Can you manage to complete the manuscript by Friday?
Can you please help me put price tags on everything?
Can you please take this package to the post office?
Can you teach me how to play the guitar like you do?
